featured.text: The creation of the park was inspired by his daughter, Morgan, who suffers from severe cognitive delay and physical challenges.

other.text: Nowadays many companies adopt a ______ work schedule which allows their employees to decide when to arrive at work—from as early as 6 a.m. to as late as 11 a.m. (A) relative (B) severe (C) primitive (D) flexible 2.

definition.example: The storm caused severe damage to the buildings.
